title: Pet Rescue
description: Dr. Fell, the master from the popular Sip, Pet Sitting, is teaching English at a local college, and working on fixing up his cabin, but Ben, and Ben's sub twink want him to get back into the swing of regular life, worried that he's withdrawn after the death of his lover Rob.One night stands aren't helping, the beaten and hurt young man he finds hiding in the alley might just be what he needs. Jamie thinks he's getting what he deserves, but Dr. Fell and Ben work at getting the young man away from his cruel master, but will Dr. Fell be able to let go of his memories long enough to help Jamie really be free?
author: Syd McGinley
